item.content:encoded: Super proud to have been a part of this pathbreaking monopsony case on behalf of a class of chicken growers. Shout out to @AugustusUrschel, who managed the case and implemented two impact models‚Äîone for information sharing via AgriStats and another for the no-poach agreement.

item.content:encoded: I synthesized a range of what I felt were credible forecasts for data center infrastructure computing. Used our foundry capacity model to make sure said amount of chips could be produced. Remember, AI factories are additive TAM as general-purpose servers remain.

item.content:encoded: Polling of Gen Z feels weird to me. In the latest YouGov/Economist poll 18-29 year olds: - Have the highest net favorability for Trump of any age group - Believe that democracy is working very or somewhat well at much higher rates than other groups.

item.content:encoded: It‚Äôs been an extraordinary honor to serve the American public as @FTC Chair. As I wrap up my record-keeping obligations and other administrative requirements, I will depart the Commission by January 31. I wish Chair Ferguson and the Commission the best of luck.

item.content:encoded: TSMC's average content per smartphone more than tripled in CY24 vs CY14 or 12% CAGR. Despite maturity, the smartphone processor die sizes growing 5-10% due to AI. TSMC's smartphone gains have slowed down in recent years but the trend is upwards in general.
